```{python}
import pandas as pd
data = pd.read_csv('fast_food_nutrition_updated.csv')
max_carb_row = data.loc[data['Carbohydrates'].idxmax()]
print(f"{max_carb_row['Menu Item']} from {max_carb_row['Restaurant']} has the most carbs: {max_carb_row['Carbohydrates']}")

```


```{python}
max_protein_row = data.loc[data['Protein'].idxmax()]
print(f"{max_protein_row['Menu Item']} from {max_protein_row['Restaurant']} has the most protein: {max_protein_row['Protein']}g, Calories: {max_protein_row['Calories']}")
```


```{python}
filtered = data[data['Protein'] > 10]
filtered = filtered[filtered['Calories'] > 0]
filtered['Protein_per_Calorie'] = filtered['Protein'] / filtered['Calories']
max_row = filtered.loc[filtered['Protein_per_Calorie'].idxmax()]
print(f"{max_row['Menu Item']} from {max_row['Restaurant']} has the most protein per calorie: {max_row['Protein_per_Calorie']:.3f}g protein/calorie")
```


```{python}
high_protein_low_cal = data[(data['Protein'] > 35) & (data['Calories'] < 300)]
print(high_protein_low_cal[['Menu Item', 'Restaurant', 'Protein', 'Calories']])
```


```{python}
import pandas as pd
data = pd.read_csv('fast_food_nutrition_updated.csv')
taco_bell_rows = data[data['Restaurant'].str.lower() == 'taco bell']
print(taco_bell_rows)
if not taco_bell_rows.empty:
    max_protein_row = taco_bell_rows.loc[taco_bell_rows['Protein'].idxmax()]
    print(f"Highest protein item at Taco Bell: {max_protein_row['Menu Item']} with {max_protein_row['Protein']}g protein")
else:
    print("No Taco Bell items found.")
```
